localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Share your remote story! We are excited to introduce RemoteRated, a focused place to rate and review the remote competence, benefits, and tools of companies. Like Glassdoor, for our new remote world.
nodes.title: RemoteRated - Glassdoor for a remote world
nodes.author: Maxim Wheatley

nodes.excerpt: Tally is a new type of form builder. Just start typing and build forms for all purposes in seconds. Without knowing how to code, and for free!
nodes.title: Tally - The simplest way to create forms for free
nodes.author: Filip Minev

nodes.excerpt: Our browser-based plug-in lets you build Excel import automation processes in less than 10 minutes. No code required. And the tool works in any online business system.
nodes.title: Cognifirm - Automated Excel import into any online business system
nodes.author: Per Damgaard

nodes.excerpt: Hand Music is an easy to use music app which can be controlled by moving your palm to any block. Simply position your hand above a block to hear it play.
nodes.title: Hand Music - Make music with your hand gestures
nodes.author: rihab

nodes.excerpt: Karaoke with friends together on the web or in VR and bring a little laughter back to everyone's homes. The brand new quarantine pastime. Currently in Beta!
nodes.title: Karaoke Nite - Karaoke with friends together on the web or in VR
nodes.author: Sonny Li

nodes.excerpt: We have created a motivating way for people to mix exercise and fun. It is a library of augmented reality games: Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, and Brick Breaker AR. Do pushups to play the games. Go play at playar.ai and earn your spot on the leaderboard!
nodes.title: PlayAR - Augmented reality games to get you moving
nodes.author: Anika Mehrotra

nodes.excerpt: Kbee transforms Google Drive folders into a searchable wiki for you, your team, or your customers.
nodes.title: Kbee - Turn Google Drive into a wiki or help center
nodes.author: Sandeep Dinesh

nodes.excerpt: Focus on what matters, from small tasks to life goals: - Spend your time doing things and reaching your goals - Stop wasting your time classifying things or measuring productivity. Minimalist and delightful design. No sign up. No ads. No data collected.
nodes.title: Listed - The minimalist app for your to-dos & notes
nodes.author: FranÃ§ois Goldgewicht

nodes.excerpt: A comprehensive tool for ensuring that Applicant Tracking Systems (ATSs) and other automatic filtering systems can accurately read you CV and extract text from it. Your CV will only progress to a human reviewer if a machine can read it properly.
nodes.title: e-Read My CV - Test if machine can parse your CV and read its content
nodes.author: Vlad  Grossman

nodes.excerpt: Live online tech education for the Spanish-speaking world.
nodes.title: Coderhouse - Effective and accessible online live education.
nodes.author: Christian PatiÃ±o

nodes.excerpt: Scale database resources in and out on demand to match application requirements and traffic so that you pay only for what you use. Runs on every cloud with developer GraphQL, REST, JSON, CQL APIs. $25 usage credits per month.
nodes.title: Astra Serverless Database - An on-demand database for supercharging your next project
nodes.author: Jake Luciani

nodes.excerpt: Litmaps lets you navigate the scientific literature with interactive visualisations of citation networks. Create a literature map, discover new articles, and export your discoveries, to advance your research project.
nodes.title: Litmaps - Search scientific literature with interactive citations map
nodes.author: Axton Pitt

nodes.excerpt: The fastest way to create screenshots of your app for product pages on Apple App Store, Google Play Store, Microsoft Store, etc.
nodes.title: Screen - Screenshot creator for product pages on app stores
nodes.author: TRACTION

nodes.excerpt: Discover new interesting things by exploring the space around links ğŸš€.
nodes.title: Arkipelago.space - A map of fascinating things on the internet
nodes.author: Dmitri Kyle Brereton

nodes.excerpt: Drink Map is a small app that helps you log the places in which you have drunk. By pressing the only real button available, "Raise the jug", you'll mark your location. Learn a new fact every time you use the app on the DID YOU KNOW? section!
nodes.title: Drink Map - Mark places where you have drunk
nodes.author: Unai Sanchez

nodes.excerpt: Keka wants to be an easy to use little app, well integrated in macOS and very powerful. And it is. You can compress files in all common (and not that common) formats and uncompress almost every format file, with and without encryption.
nodes.title: Keka - The macOS file archiver
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: HelloScribe Guru can write a draft on just about any topic - in seconds. Automated writing for long-form content has never been faster, easier, or more convenient. Get off the blank page - say bye-bye writer's block!
nodes.title: HelloScribe Guru - Your AI-powered article writer - for real.
nodes.author: George Prendergast

nodes.excerpt: Beam makes it easy to get paid to text your biggest fans. Send premium paid content, images, or videos directly to your monthly paying subscribers.
nodes.title: Beam - Get paid to delight your followers via text
nodes.author: Justin Mitchell

nodes.excerpt: B2B buyers are tired of the traditional sales process and want a B2C like buying experience. Deal Rooms transform your sales process to sell B2B buyers how they want to be sold. Open to close, deal rooms help your sales teams sell more and sell fast.
nodes.title: Referenceable - Deal rooms create B2C like buying experiences for B2B buyers
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Eco puts your money back to work for you. It's a single balance that lets you spend, send, save and make money at the same time. Earn 2.5-5% on your balance, plus get 5% cashback at merchants. And, soon, pay bills and send money to friends for more rewards.
nodes.title: The Eco App - One simple balance for saving, spending, and making money.
nodes.author: Andy Bromberg

nodes.excerpt: Yep, it's one of those stash services again. But I don't think there's been one focused only on resources to supercharge designers, entrepreneurs, founders, indie-makers, side-hustlers and anyone building digital products or services. Lifetime accessğŸ‰
nodes.title: Zupermaker - 1000+ tools & resources to grow and supercharge your skills

nodes.title: Poser illustrations - Customizable illustrations for your projects
nodes.author: Greg Dlubacz

nodes.excerpt: Make Your Own Automations - Build fully managed browser automations with BrowserBird. It's easy, fast, no programming knowledge needed to build browser automations with BrowserBird.
nodes.title: BrowserBird - Low code browser automation builder and serverless puppeteer
